title: Hello oyijon
overview: Halima (55 years old) sends her son Shokhrukh (25 years old) to study in America, he returns after studying, and says that he is bringing his daughter-in-law with him. Halima's joy knows no bounds, and she has already gathered all her relatives in the house. But when she sees Shokhrukh's chosen one, the mother is horrified - a dark-skinned girl, Julia, has arrived with her son. Halima does not want to put up with this - after all, this is a disgrace to the entire village. Now Shokhrukh must prove to his mother that there should be no prejudices for true love
